title: Robotic Surgery Training Course for Skill Enhancement with Standardized Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of surgical instruments
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based real-time feedback systems integrated with virtual surgery simulation tools

learning_goals: Perform basic operations of robotic surgical systems with 90% accuracy
Reduce surgical error rates by 30% in the second practice session compared to the first after applying feedback
Achieve a minimum score improvement of 2 points in the GEARS-based technical evaluation criteria during the second practical session

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
